item.title: How to tet through a Data interview Part 2
item.description: Continuing with the series of posts that I am putting together about the selection processes in the world of data, I leave here this second part focused on the evaluations of statistics, programming and machine learning. Everything you are going to read is subject to a compilation of personal experiences, talks with colleagues and the Internet. There is no exact formula but I hope I can provide you with a skeleton of how the different parts are evaluated.
